item.title: How to Deploy an OpenVPN Server on OpenWrt 19.07
item.description:
ðŸ“Œ This should also work on the current OpenWrt 21.02 release candidate.

This guide outlines how to configure an OpenWrt gateway as a OpenVPN server, which is perfect for providing secure remote access to your local network from anywhere.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
